paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Leu111Glu, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We diagnosed the patient with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.
The patient's sibling was diagnosed with ATTRv amyloidosis owing to vitreous opacity and died from hydrocephalus in his 30s.

functional_data.summary: The Leu131Gln variant is suggested to be amyloidogenic based on the spectral count ratio.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.population_frequency: Not reported in variant databases to date.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first case report of the transthyretin Leu111Glu variant.
key_quotes: This mutation may result in a predominantly hydrocephalus phenotype.
Genetic analysis confirmed a novel missense variant, Leu111Glu, on the transthyretin gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
